title: Calcium L-aspartate nanoparticles modify the root ultrastructure and improve plant yield in Brassica napus L.
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,2620-2632
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00989K, Paper
Kesong Lu, Jiayu Hou, Muhammad Riaz, Saba Babar, Ali M. Abd-Elkader, Zeinab El-Desouki, Cuncang Jiang
Schematic diagram of Ca(L-asp)-NPs regulating the root structure and yield. Ca(L-asp)-NPs were transported through vascular tissues, which improved plant traits and yield factors and promoted the development of rapeseed root architecture.
